name: Wordnik
short: Wordnik is the world's biggest online English dictionary, by number of words.
description: Wordnik is the world's biggest online English dictionary, by number of words.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Wordnik API for Red-DiscordBot
1. Get a key here: 
https://developer.wordnik.com
2. Set the key: 
[p]set api wordnik api_key,your-api-key
author: jmes
